title: PERMISSIONS: Player Memos
custom_preconds:
AC:

* There will be a new permission group created to govern access to the Player Memos utility
* This will be an individual permission and not added to any role
* There will be both an Admin/editor role that allows creation/editing/sending
* There will be a Viewer role that only allows viewing templates and history widget and viewing the related items

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to add an attachment to a player memo
custom_preconds:
Wire: https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1

AC:
- There will be an attach file section on a new player memo as shown on the wire
 - Users will be able to drag and drop or browse for a file to attach
 - When a file is attached:
  -- Filename, Last Modified, and Size will be displayed
  -- There will be a trashcan icon displayed that will enable the user to remove the file
 - When the blast is sent, the email will contain the attached files as attachments
 - There will be a file size limit

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to specify the recipient(s) on a new player memo
custom_preconds:
Wire: https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1

AC:
- There will be a 'Players' dropdown at the top of a new player memo with the following values:
  -- All Players
  -- 26-Man
  -- 40-Man
  -- Non-40-Man
  -- Minor Leagues
  -- Specific Player
 - If a value other than "Specific Player" is selected, an Org dropdown will appear, as depicted
  -- The dropdown will be required, if visible
 - If "Specific Player" is selected, a Player field will appear (not depicted)
  -- This Player field will function the same, and have the same population, as the pro player quick search
  -- The field will be required, if visible
 - If a value other than "Specific Player" is selected, the memo will be sent to players at the roster level and Org specified
 - If "Specific Player is selected, the memo will be sent to the player specified

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to create a new player memo
custom_preconds:
Wire: [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=new_memo&g=1]

AC:

* On the Player Memo History widget, there will be a New Memo button
* Clicking the button will load the new player memo screen
* The screen will match the provided wire
** The attachment section and wysiwyg editor will both work as expected
* There will be a Cancel button on the page
* Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action
** If the user confirms, they will be returned to the Email Blast tab
** If the user does not confirm, the warning will be dismissed

title: As an AMT Admin, I want the Check-in Period Dates moved
custom_preconds:
Please set the new Check-in Period dates in AMT to be in alignment with the new signing period.

This update is for the NEXT period, set to begin 1/15/2023

Period 1:
  -- Start 1/15
  -- End 7/14
Period 2:
  -- Start 7/15
  -- End 1/14

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a Player Memo History widget
custom_preconds:
Wire:  [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=player_memos&g=1|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=player_memos&g=1]
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2575892525/Data+Discovery+-+Memo+History|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2575892525/Data+Discovery+-+Memo+History]

AC:

* On the Player Memos tab, there will be a History widget
* The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a Player Memo Templates widget
custom_preconds:
Wire:  [https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_blasts|https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_blasts]
Data Discovery: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1598325107/Data+Discovery+-+Email+Templates|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/1598325107/Data+Discovery+-+Email+Templates]

AC:

* On the Email Blasts tab, there will be a Email Templates widget
* The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
* The Templates widget will appear below the History widget

Note: not currently in the Player Memo wires, using the Email Blast wires as it is the same functionality

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a new Communication dashboard on the ebis left nav
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the left nav
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a new "Communication" dashboard available
AND the Email Blasts utility will be moved from the System dashboard to Communication
AND there will be a new Player Memo tab added under Communication dashboard
AND only users with the new Player Memo permissions will see this tab
AND clicking the Player Memo tab will load utility

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to see a new MLB Contact Info Section on Professional Player Profiles
custom_preconds:
Wire: https://ll2j6l.axshare.com/#p=info&g=1

AC:
 - There will be a new MLB Contact Info section on professional player profiles
 - Within this section will be:
  -- Country Code
  -- Phone Number
  -- Email Address
  -- WhatsApp
 - In edit mode, this section will be it's own accordion section
 - In view mode, it is rolled up under Contact info as a new subsection

title: As an BOC Intl Admin, I want Registration data points sent to IPL
custom_preconds:
Related to: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/PIVOTAL-1290

AC:
 - The following fields will be made available to IPL for consumption:
  -- Registration Status
  -- L1 Reg Date
  -- Eligible to Sign Date (per Registration Requirements)
 - All status updates or date changes will be reflected in the communication

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to edit Earliest Reinstatement Date on Transfer to 60-Day IL transactions
custom_preconds:
Related to: https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/EBISII-20323

AC:
 - When a Transfer to 60-Day IL transaction is in edit mode, the Earliest Reinstatement Date will be editable to BOC Admins
 - Please confirm all other IL Transfer transactions have Earliest Reinstatement Date editable for BOC Admins

title: As a Intl Admin, I want to remove Spreadsheet upload for Intl Ama Players
custom_preconds:
AC:
 - All Intl amateur player entry will come through IPL
 - The Spreadsheet upload button on the Club Reg List widget will no longer be available

title: As an Intl Amateur Admin, I want EBIS to consume Intl Amateurs from IPL
As a Partner League Admin, I want matching added to Passed Over Player creation in EBIS
custom_preconds: Add matching to Passed Over Player creation in EBIS to check if the player exists in the Partner League

title: Update PIEF List Thresholds
custom_preconds:
PIEF List Stat Thresholds will be updated to the values in this documentation: [https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2580054050/PIEF+List+Stat+Thresholds+-+2022|https://baseball.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/EBIS/pages/2580054050/PIEF+List+Stat+Thresholds+-+2022|smart-link] 

We should explore updating how these values are stored to make them easier to update.
